artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Painter: After Ludovico Carracci
description: Blessed virgin seated on a throne holding Christ Child with saints kneeling at her feet and angels and cherubs around and above her; two cherubs placing a crown on her head; seated figure lower right foreground offering container
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ L. Carracci dip.   F.Rosaspina dis e inc./B. VERGINE IN TRONO COL BAMBINO]
title: B. Vergine in Trono Col Bambino
